markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Light Paws](/Feats.aspx?ID=5552) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Catfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=746" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 10 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

You can balance on your toes to step carefully over obstructions. You Stride and then Step, or Step and then Stride, ignoring [difficult terrain](/Rules.aspx?ID=453) during this movement.
name: Light Paws
